summary:
- Specialized use of Windows and Cisco Systems, servers, switches, routers, hubs, firewalls, LAN, WAN, TCP/IP, DNS, DHCP,TCP/ UDP
        
- Install and upgrade hardware-based networks, network services, equipment and research and identify solutions to software and hardware issues
        
- Plan and support network and computing infrastructure
        
- Perform troubleshooting analysis of network, servers, workstations and associated systems
        
- Play a vital role in implementation and support of IT-related policies
        
- Diagnose and troubleshoot technical issues, including account setup and network configuration
        
- Prioritize and manage several open issues with multiple clients at one time
        
- Evaluating and incorporating industry trends, standards, and new technologies that drive effective change & exceptional performance
        
- Support in preparing client purchases including installation and setup of servers, workstations, network devices, and software
        
- Effective and timely communication with management to complete tasks
Expedited the synergies of collaborative agile tooling.
